EmailTemplate.name: MBO Partners Follow Up with Lewan & Associates (1374100146.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners Follow Up with Lewan & Associates (1374100146.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Shea, It was a pleasure speaking with you and Todd today, thank you again for taking the time to speak with me! As a summary of our discussion today, MBO’s service is twofold. On one side, for our clients, MBO provides a streamlined way to mitigate independent contractor risk as well as organize the contingent workforce companies utilize. Here is a link to our website that speaks to how we help organizations manage their independent consultants: http://www.mboenterprise.com/how-we-help <http://www.mboenterprise.com/how-we-help>. We have also put together a short one page collateral <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Introduction.pdf> that explains how we work and the markets we serve. On the other side our Exec program is designed for independent consultants and small businesses <http://link.mbopartners.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCbFVPuk5iy%2FuUI6Dh0TbPd%2FLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D#howwehelp> who choose to plug into the MBO Services Cloud and make it easier for them to work with their clients. We take care of all the back office administrative, HR, regulatory and financial issues so the IC’s can stay focused on delivering services. I have included a link to my landing page that we send to consultants after our initial call with them that has a multitude of information about our Exec program by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-n-taylor.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlJWuldz%2BdybLqjulDfJaJyvqbNoGbrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D>. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to me directly or schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCdlJWuldz%2BdybLqjulDfJaJyvqbNoGbrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you again soon! Have a great day, Nicolette___________________________________Nicolette TaylorConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6281f: 703.793.6456e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com <bbentley@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=taylor> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them.
